vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones

Class RectZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jdesktop.animation.timing.TimingTargetAdapter
      • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.ZoneAnimator
        • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.Zone
          • vialab.simpleMultiTouch.zones.RectZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.jdesktop.animation.timing.TimingTarget
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DrawZone, GarbageZone, ImageZone, PGraphicsZone, RotatableDrawZone, SliderZone, TextZone, VideoZone

    public class RectZone
extends Zone
    This is the basic rectangular zone class.

    University of Ontario Institute of Technology. Summer Research Assistant with Dr. Christopher Collins (Summer 2011) collaborating with Dr. Mark Hancock.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Erik Paluka

        float y,
        float width,
        float height)
        RectZone constructor, creates a rectangular zone by calling "createRectZone()"
        Parameters:
        x - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        y - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        width - int - Width of the zone
        height - int - Height of the zone

      • createRectZone

        public void createRectZone(float xIn,
                  float yIn,
                  float wIn,
                  float hIn)
        Sets the x, y, width, height, and translate area radius (for RNT gesture) of the new rectangular zone.
        Parameters:
        xIn - int - X-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        yIn - int - Y-coordinate of the upper left corner of the zone
        wIn - int - Width of the zone
        hIn - int - Height of the zone
